NotFoundPage.title: 404 NOT FOUND
NotFoundPage.message: The page you are looking for does not exist, sorry for the inconvenience.

UserPage.Questions: If you have any questions, please leave a message to get your inquiries answered
UserPage.FeedbackBtn: Do you want to ask any questions or provide any feedback?
UserPage.BannerSubtitle: The Best Choice for Your Journey
UserPage.SectionOneTitle: Compare Cheap Train And Bus Tickets With Flights
UserPage.SectionOneDescription: With FPT Train, you can compare flight tickets with train and bus tickets.
UserPage.SectionTwoDescription: Search and book cheap flights, buses, ferries, and trains! Find the best deals with FPT Train.
UserPage.SectionThreeTitle: Schedules And Tickets For All Your Travel Needs
UserPage.SectionThreeDescription: Booking train, bus, flight, or ferry tickets has never been easier.

CheckTicketPage.NotificationOne: According to the regulations of Vietnam Railways Corporation, passengers are only eligible to board the train if the information on their identification documents matches the information on the electronic ticket.
CheckTicketPage.NotificationTwo: To ensure the rights of passengers and avoid purchasing counterfeit tickets or tickets that do not comply with regulations, you can verify your electronic ticket by filling in the information below.

ReturnTicketPage.title: Return Ticket
ReturnTicketPage.notification1: Ticket returns only apply to customers who have paid online (via payment gateway, e-wallet, banking app) and provided an email when purchasing the ticket.
ReturnTicketPage.notification2: If you paid in cash, via postpaid banking app or ATM, by bank transfer, or in case of ticket cancellation due to issues, please proceed with the return procedure at the ticket counters.
ReturnTicketPage.titlefrom: To display the ticket to be returned, please enter the following 3 accurate details:

NotificationPopup.title: Welcome to LacLacTrip!
NotificationPopup.content: We are delighted to welcome you! Here, you can easily search for and book train tickets for your journey. Explore the routes and special offers. If you need assistance, don't hesitate to contact us. We wish you a pleasant trip!
